about_the_game:
Boreas is an exciting adventure where you will sail, trade, and help the inhabitants of distant islands.

Travel between islands and archipelagos, steer your ship, discover optimal routes, and help the locals in improving their settlements. Your efforts will unlock new trading opportunities and draw you closer to uncovering the truth behind the dreadful Boreas storm!

Ship and Sea

The sea is calm yet perilous. Be prepared for unexpected adventures! Steer the ship: adjust the sails and keep an eye on the pressure. After storms, the ocean often reveals hidden treasures. Gather these valuables and manage your cargo carefully to maximize your trading profits.

Trade

The locals are always eager to trade. Build profitable trade routes, seek out the best deals, and help the islanders — your efforts will unlock new opportunities and aid you in your quest!

Settlement Upgrades

The more you help the locals, the faster their settlements thrive. New trading posts and characters will emerge, and perhaps one of them holds the key to the secrets behind the Boreas storm!

short_description: The Northern Storm Boreas has become a hardship for all the inhabitants of the Kingdom, but not for our brave heroes — a lighthouse keeper and his best friend, a seagull. Embark on a journey - steer the ship, explore new islands, and help the locals so they, in turn, can help you.
